page.title: 11THE POLICE
page.content: There are over 60 uniformed officers stationed in Worksop. This does not include C.I.D., traffic and communications personnel who would bring the total up to about 100. For a market town, Worksop has a fairly high crime rate. The main crimes are theft from cars, vandalism, shoplifting and burlary. Recently Worksop has had a large number of burglaries to dwelling houses. There has been an incident which resulted in a man's death and a serious assault on young children on the outskirts of Clumber Park. The Police find Worksop townspeople very friendly and fair-minded, though they would like to improve their relations with the public. Crime prevention officers visit all the schools in the area.
